Kayla Montgomery, a high school senior, is considered to be...
...one of the country's fastest long distance runners in her age group.
And when a race ends, she collapses to the ground.
Incredibly, the same MS that leaves her unable to remain standing...
...at the end of a race, could be what helps make her race times so good.
It blocks the pain receptors in her brain,...
...so when most runners begin to feel pain and slow down,...
